short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all images on all pages to Shrinithi Narayanan AKA the coolest person ever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: nithinara is made for users to better enjoy their browsing experience. Using jQuery, nithinara replaces all imgs on a site with pictures of Shrinithi Narayanan AKA the coolest person ever. If you want a better browsing experience, download nithinara!
